item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 20, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:

12. Android phones will soon reboot themselves after sitting unused for three days (308 points | 244 comments)

27. Monsky's Theorem (36 points | 11 comments)

29. Vibe Coding is not an excuse for low-quality work (187 points | 139 comments)
